comments.body: We need a `required_if` to make sure the `config` is present when `state` is either `merged`, `replaced` or `overridden`.
@NilashishC I'll have to add this for both IOS and IOSXR, have raised an issue #61321 for tracking

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +408,412 @@    Main entry point for module execution
    :returns: the result form module invocation
    """
    module = AnsibleModule(argument_spec=L3_InterfacesArgs.argument_spec,
                           supports_check_mode=True)
